titleStmt.title: The cheating solliciter cheated being a true and perfect relation of the life and death of Richard Farr : with an exact character of his wench, Mrs. Eleanor Chadwick : both executed at Tyburn, the 12th of April last past.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped and tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
